title: Lentil Mediterranean Grill
typeOfFood: Lacto, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Order at the counter. Choose from a rice bowl or pita wrap, add fillings, protein (including falafel). Sauces, except the ranch, are vegan suitable and include hummus, tahini, garlic sauce, and chipotle garlic. A daily vegetable soup.
